description: black ink on paper; image of swimming carp in a minimally rendered body of water; foliage along upper left edge and lower left quadrant; soft waves run horizontally across middle of image; carp's body is curved with head breaking surface of water and facing upwards toward PL; untranslated characters and red stamp in LLC
object_name: Hanging scroll, one of a triptych
title: Carp [left of a triptych of Taigong Wang, Dragon, and Carp]
